Message:
There was also a witch
who lived hidden away,
deep in the forest...
One who lived longer than me...

Oh! And one who was planning
to start a revolution.

She was filled with the same
zeal I had in my younger days,
proclaiming, “I’ll build
a country for witches!”

If we’d met a little sooner,
I might’ve helped her cause.

However, even I, the wise Gil’uial,
would’ve clearly understood
back then just how foolhardy
a revoltion was.

Not only that, but it wasn’t
something every witch
wished for.

So, I tried convincing her
to think of another way...

but my words just went in
one ear and out the other.

Since I’ve caught no wind
of any rumors about her
thereafter, it means...
Well, I’m sure you can
figure it out.

If she were still alive,
I’d like nothing more
than to have another
chat with her.
